name: Fatal Error: Robot Escape
description:
Created for Bolt Jam #5.

I made this project for my first ever game jam entry and my first full project using the visual scripting plugin Bolt for Unity. It was a fantastically fun challenge and I really enjoyed the process.

The game is called Fatal Error: Robots Escape.

You control a blaster at the doorway of a warehouse where all the robots have had a "fatal error" and are now trying to escape. Each robot has an assigned color, and has to be blasted using the same color energy in order to decommission it. Protect the outside world from the run away robots and rack up as many points you can.

Enjoy!

Asset Store assets used:
Bolt
Beautify
Master Audio: AAA Sound
Epic Toon Fx
Sci-Fi Styled Modular Pack
Simple UI

Music from bensound.com
